amendment.description: Amendment requires that the Department of Defense use American-owned and operated aircraft whenever possible to move cargo and passengers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 41106 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Runyan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
